::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder openes a return channel to Hydras over the shuttle=
 comm system.
=A0
Elder: Alright, Hydras. We work together for this cause. =
After it is done, however, the Maximals will get their people back, and I'l=
l help them do it. Oh and that includes Rodimus Prime. I'll await the arriv=
al of your forces.
=A0
Elder closes the channel.
=A0
::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorpon=
ok::
=A0
Jhiaxus: Scorponok and I'll head for the Ark. I'll be slowed down =
while carrying him.
=A0
Scorponok changes back to scorpion mode. The head t=
ransforms to Zarak who lands in Jhiaxus' cockpit as he transforms to jet mo=
de. Jhaxis lowers himself to where he is over the scorponok shell and makes=
 a magnetic junction. He begins to lift off and head out.
=A0
::Grimlock::
=
=A0
Grimlock looks around, wondering why the Maximals wern't jumping into g=
ear.
=A0
Grimlock: Maximals: roll out?!

--0-1104670195-1214885075=:97816
Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Elder::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder openes a return channel to Hydras over the shuttle comm system.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: Alright, Hydras. We work together for this cause. After it is done, however, the Maximals will get their people back, and I'll help them do it. Oh and that includes Rodimus Prime. I'll await the arrival of your forces.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder closes the channel.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorponok::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus: Scorponok and I'll head for the Ark. I'll be slowed down while carrying him.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Scorponok changes back to scorpion mode. The head transforms to Zarak who lands in Jhiaxus' cockpit as he transforms to jet mode. Jhaxis lowers himself to where he is over the scorponok shell and makes a magnetic junction. He begins to lift off and head out.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Grimlock::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock looks around, wondering why the Maximals wern't jumping into gear.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: Maximals: roll out?!<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sun, 6/29/08, xochitla2006 <I><xochitla2006@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
